title: The Colonel's Bed, Inverey
description: Discover Scotland's dramatic coastline on this easy walk to this Highland destination, where dramatic sea cliffs and Atlantic views creates a scene of raw Highland beauty.

title: Fairy Pool and Riverside walk, Glen Tanar
